programme.title: THE NEXT BIG LEAPS
programme.desc: The New Frontier: THE NEXT BIG LEAPS, S05E10, Projects in the works. SunRISE, SPHEREx, NEOS and others, their mission to expand our knowledge of Earth, the surrounding space, Dark Matter, and the earliest galaxies. N

programme.title: Living In Space
programme.desc: The New Frontier: Living In Space, S03E01, How do astronauts cope with living in space? The unique environment, the lack of taste in their food and the smell of canned air all contribute to the stresses of living and working in space.

programme.title: Set Course For Heart of the Sun
programme.desc: The New Frontier: Set Course For Heart of the Sun, S04E02, NASA’S Parker Solar Probe Mission is on its way and will be shortly followed by Europe’s Solar probe Mission.

programme.title: INCREASING ORBIT
programme.desc: The New Frontier: INCREASING ORBIT, S05E05, The ISS is the workhorse of the international spacefaring community, but its days are numbered. R

programme.title: Gravity

programme.title: Return To The Moon

programme.title: Invasion on Mars

programme.title: The Original Nightstalker
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S03E05, In the 1980s, a serial killer prowled the posh streets of Orange County. Police were unaware of the serial attacks until 1996, when DNA revealed the killer's secret and they linked four murders to a single DNA profile.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S05E21, Detectives are baffled when two young girls are raped, murdered, and dumped in an abandoned house in Akron, Ohio. And a 26-year-old mother of three disappears on Christmas Eve in 1995, but the missing person case goes cold when police can find few clues

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S04E18, A forensic scientist's painstaking examination of a rape kit helps solve the 15-year-old murder of a teenage girl. And when California investigators probe the murder of a 71-year-old man, they get help from the top suspect's former therapist.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S02E15, Fire investigator Jack Malooly helps crack the case of an arsonist and killer who set fires to collect insurance money, and a prison inmate tells a detective that he can't help him with his current investigation, but knows about a 15-year-old murder.

programme.title: Left for Dead / On the Case (#126)
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S05E25, A detective in California tracks down a prostitute's killer with the help of a key piece of evidence. And two persistent cold case detectives use DNA to investigate the 1990 murder of a woman and the death of a man killed in a car crash in 1988.

programme.title: Love and Hate
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S02E07, Near what's known as the hanging tree, the mutilated body of Timothy Coggins is found in late 1983. The investigation is thwarted and the case freezes for over 30 years, until a newly elected sheriff vows to bring the killers to justice.

programme.title: Green River Killer/Missing And The Dead
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S03E13, In 1982 and '83, Seattle's Green River Killer stalked prostitutes like game. With 49 victims, he could be the deadliest serial killer in U.S. history. Then, a passing motorist spots a fire along a road in South Carolina and calls it in.

programme.title: The Cuff Link/The Unluckiest Man
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S02E11, Police solve an old murder case with a painstaking examination of the tool mark on the plastic flex cuff that bound the victim's hands, and a 15-year-old murder case is finally cracked open.

programme.title: The Sunday Morning Slasher
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S05E11, Law enforcement officials fear they may have to release a serial killer from prison until a 24-year-old murder case gives them a chance to lock him up for good.

programme.title: Lone Survivor
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S02E27, In early 1984, three-year-old Vanessa Bennett becomes the lone survivor of her family's brutal murder. Initial investigators suspect a serial killer is at large, but decades pass before DNA narrows the suspect pool to one man.

programme.title: Killer On The Strip/The Doll Murder
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S01E11, In 1989, socialite Susan Doll was found beaten, raped, and strangled in Colorado.

programme.title: A Killer's Skin / Where's Peggy? (#110)
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S05E28, Police in Albany, N.Y., get a surprise when a killer they think targets only older women is suspected in the murder of an elderly man. And the contents of a secret storage shed holds the grisly clues to a murder that has gone cold for more than 14 years.

programme.title: Ice Cold in Denver
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S02E08, On a bitter morning in 1980, radio intern Helene Pruszynski is found brutalized in a snowy field. After 37 years of fruitless leads, investigators tap into a genealogy website that gives them a lead.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S05E17, In Rhode Island, policewomen go undercover as streetwalkers to nab the man suspected of murdering three prostitutes. And a dagger-shaped letter opener is the key piece of evidence that links a priest to the grisly 1980 murder of a nun in Ohio.

programme.title: Blood Money/Precious Doe
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S03E20, Testimony about the growth of larvae in dead bodies helps convict the man who stabbed a couple to death and strangled their 4-year-old daughter in 1993.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S02E13, Police reopen a rape-murder case 25 years after the crime and find enough DNA evidence to bring him to justice. And a confession made to a "Baywatch" TV star helps police solve the three-year-old riddle of a wealthy Newport Beach woman's murder.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S01E06, In Missouri, a part-time missionary is convicted, 38 years later, of killing her 5-year-old stepdaughter, and the skeleton of a Michigan boy, dead for 10 years, leads police to a serial killer.

MST3K: The Day The Earth Froze, 19930116000000 +0000, Joel and the Bots learn the ins and outs of the circus in the short Here Comes the Circus (1946) and then try to make sense of the Nordic fairy tale film The Day the Earth Froze (1959).
MST3K: The Dead Talk Back, 19940730000000 +0000, Metaphysics helps to solve a murder case while Mike and the Bots impersonate the Grateful Dead.

MST3K: The Final Sacrifice, 19980725000000 +0000, With the help of a mysterious map and a truck-driving drifter named Rowsdower, young Troy McGreggor sets out on a dark adventure across Alberta in search of the answers behind the hooded cult responsible for his father's grisly murder.
The Giant Gila Monster, 20020612000000 +0000, A hit-and-run victim is brought back from the dead by a voodoo doctor, and then seeks revenge.
MST3K: The Giant Spider Invasion, 19970531000000 +0000, Mike and the 'bots suffer through The Giant Spider Invasion (1975).
MST3K: The Horror Of Party Beach, 19970906000000 +0000, Pearl and Observer are in Ancient Rome pretending to be gods as Mike and the 'bots watch The Horror of Party Beach (1964).
MST3K: The Magic Voyage Of Sinbad (Sadko), 19930814000000 +0000, An adventurer sets sail in search of the bird of happiness in Sadko (1953).
MST3K: The Mask, 20221028000000 +0000, For MST3K's first-ever Halloween episode, Jonah's crew watch THE MASK (1961) in 3D! Jonah teaches the bots about Halloween.
MST3K: The Million Eyes Of Sumuru, 20220902000000 +0000, Jonah's crew watch an evil woman bent on world domination in THE MILLION EYES OF SUMURU (1967). The bots realize Jonah is tall.
MST3K: The Painted Hills, 20170901070000 +0000, A Lassie movie, set in 1870s California amongst rival gold miners. The 1950s-era short teaches college students how to improve their hygiene.
Northpole, 20251105062122 +0000, Hallmark Original Movie. A loss of togetherness spreads across the globe and threatens the Northpole.
A Majestic Christmas, 20251105080106 +0000, Hallmark Original Movie. Nell finds romance in her effort to save the Christmas Pageant.
Fallen Angel, 20251105094459 +0000, Hallmark Hall of Fame. A high-powered Los Angeles lawyer returns to his deceased father's home.
The Wishing Tree, 20251105113800 +0000, Hallmark Original Movie. A professor supervises orphan students who have nowhere to go for the holidays.
One Christmas Eve, 20251105132217 +0000, Hallmark Hall of Fame. A divorced mom wants her two kids' first Christmas without dad to be perfect.
The National Tree, 20251105150647 +0000, Hallmark Original Movie. A man and his son embark on a road trip to transport a Christmas tree.
The Town Christmas Forgot, 20251105165200 +0000, Hallmark Original Movie. An upscale, urban family gets stranded in a remote lumber town before Christmas.
Sound of Christmas, 20251105183416 +0000, Hallmark Original Movie. A music teacher is hired by a widower to give lessons to his daughters.
Enchanted Christmas, 20251105201552 +0000, Hallmark Original Movie. Interior designer Laura returns to Utah to spearhead the renovation of a hotel.
Christmas at the Palace, 20251105215714 +0000, Hallmark Original Movie. Figure skater Katie brings the royal family together with her Christmas joy.
Looks Like Christmas, 20251105233807 +0000, Hallmark Original Movie. Two type-A parents battle it out for control of the Christmas holiday show.

programme.title: Be All My Sins Remember'd
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S04E11, Armed with the means to track Replicator ships, the Atlantis team strives to eliminate the Replicators once and for all. Now, the team rushes to evacuate those human settlements in the path of the advancing Replicator forces.

programme.title: Spoils Of War
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S04E12, The Atlantis long-range sensors detect the signal of a subspace tracking device familiar to Dr. McKay. The team follows to signal to a damaged hive ship drifting in space. Amidst the ship’s records, they discover references to a secret Wraith base.

programme.title: Quarantine
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S04E13, When an alarm sounds, McKay suspects that a highly infectious disease has triggered the city’s self-protection system. With vital systems affected, the Atlantis team finds themselves trapped in various sections of the city with no way out.

programme.title: Harmony
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S04E14, Wanting to maintain diplomatic relations, Sheppard and McKay accompany Harmony, a precocious young princess, on a mandatory rite of passage. However, they are unaware that she has enemies, and character flaws, yet to be dealt with.

programme.title: Outcast
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S04E15, When Lt. Colonel John Sheppard receives word that his father has passed away he returns to Earth. But once there, he becomes embroiled in a dangerous experiment gone awry—a human form Replicator now on the loose that must be recaptured at all cost.

programme.title: Trio
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S04E16, During an off-world mission in a village rocked by fierce tremors, Col. Samantha Carter, Dr. McKay, and Dr. Keller become trapped when they fall into a sinkhole. But every attempt to escape the confines of the chamber puts them in further jeopardy.

programme.title: Midway
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S04E17, The IOA has entrusted Mr. Coolidge, with interviewing Teyla Emmagan and Ronan Dex about their suitability to continue with the Atlantis expedition. Unbeknownst to anyone, a plan by the Wraith to invade the Midway station is about to be initiated.

programme.title: The Kindred (Part 1)
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S04E18, Teyla, more determined than ever to find the missing Athosians, convinces Sheppard to travel with her to a trading settlement in search for answers. What they find there leads them to startling discovery that no one could have anticipated.

programme.title: Deliverance
programme.desc: Stargate Universe, S02E11, Locked in a battle with a Drone Command Ship, the Destiny is surprised by the arrival of the aliens that abducted Rush and Chloe. After Destiny's position is revealed, the crew again comes under heavy attack. But this time, they have a plan.

programme.title: Twin Destinies
programme.desc: Stargate Universe, S02E12, Excitement spreads through the ship as Eli believes he’s found a way to dial Earth. But Dr. Rush has serious reservations about abandoning Destiny, and when the crew is interrupted by a distress call, it may just change the plans of the Destiny.

programme.title: Alliances
programme.desc: Stargate Universe, S02E13, Greer and Wray find themselves trapped in the midst of an attack when an alien ship carrying a radioactive bomb crashes into Homeworld Command. Meanwhile, Rush (Robert Carlyle) discovers that not everyone wants Greer and Wray back aboard Destiny.

programme.title: Hope
programme.desc: Stargate Universe, S02E14, While connected to the stones in an attempt to contact Homeworld Command, Chloe wakes up with Ginn’s consciousness. Eli must find a way to protect Chloe without losing Ginn. Meanwhile, Volker requires a difficult operation to save his life.

programme.title: It's Good To Be King
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S08E13, Hoping to warn Harry Maybourne of Goa'uld attacks, SG-1 arrives at his last known whereabouts to find that he has been appointed king of a primitive people and believes he possesses writings by a time-traveling Ancient predicting these events.

programme.title: Full Alert
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S08E14, When O'Neill finds the door to his home forced open and former Vice President Kinsey waiting for him inside, his first instinct is to call the police. But he allies himself with Kinsey when he learns of a rogue organization known as The Trust.

programme.title: Citizen Joe
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S08E15, At a tag sale, civilian Joe Spencer comes across a small stone that gives him visions of SG-1 in action. Delighted, he shares the stories with anyone who will listen. But when he learns that SG-1 really exists, his excitement turns into obsession.

programme.title: Reckoning (Part 1)
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S08E16, Teal'c and Bra'tac believe the time is right to lead their people in an uprising against the Goa'uld. Their plan suffers a setback when an army of Replicators begins to systematically take control of Goa'uld ships and Jackson is taken prisoner.

programme.title: Reckoning (Part 2)
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S08E17, Hidden in the ruined temple on Dakara is an Ancient weapon powerful enough to destroy the Replicators. Thanks to a timely warning, the team knows it. And thanks to Daniel's repressed Ancient knowledge, Replicator Carter knows it as well.

programme.title: Confession
programme.desc: Beverly Hills, 90210, S09E06, Kelly decides to help Leah and her daughter skip town and assume a new identity. Valerie elects to throw a massive rave as a farewell party before turning herself in to the police.

programme.title: You Say Goodbye, I Say Hello
programme.desc: Beverly Hills, 90210, S09E07, As Kelly and Valerie pack Brandon's belongings for shipment, Kelly discovers a letter in which Val advised Brandon not to marry her. She turns everyone against Val and gets them to boycott her Thanksgiving gathering.

programme.title: I'm Back Because
programme.desc: Beverly Hills, 90210, S09E08, David is arrested for statutory rape and gets suspended from his radio show. Steve bristles at the news that his mother is dating her much younger co-star. Kelly's reaction to Dylan's return worries Matt.

programme.title: The Following Options
programme.desc: Beverly Hills, 90210, S09E09, Kelly grows angry with Matt when he takes a case defending a tobacco company. Donna agrees to let a troubled fifteen-year-old girl buy a dress on layaway. Dylan takes his bullet-riddled Porsche out of storage.

programme.title: Marathon Man
programme.desc: Beverly Hills, 90210, S09E10, Dylan takes Kelly to Mexico for a day and buys her a gift, but Kelly rejects him to focus on her relationship with Matt. Dylan soon takes Gina to Mexico and buys her the same gift.

programme.title: Trials and Tribulations
programme.desc: Beverly Hills, 90210, S09E12, Dissatisfied customers take Steve to court, and wind up on TV; Gina continues to care for Dylan, who is arrested; Donna and Noah struggle to find a place to be alone; David has to back up his lie to Gertrude; Kelly second-guesses herself with Matt.

programme.title: Beheading St. Valentine
programme.desc: Beverly Hills, 90210, S09E15, Lauren moves into the Walsh house; Steve's idea for his paper leads to an alert about a potential health problem; Donna agrees to pose as David's girlfriend at a business function; Gina worries she can't keep pace with Dylan.

programme.title: Slipping Away
programme.desc: Beverly Hills, 90210, S09E17, Kelly and Dylan agree to go to Mexico and obtain medication for Lauren. Donna agrees to a date with the persistent David. Gina discovers that her mother spent most of the money she earned skating as a minor.

programme.title: Bobbi Dearest
programme.desc: Beverly Hills, 90210, S09E18, Gina decides to sue Felice for $1.1 million. Donna, torn apart by her family's bickering, runs crying to Noah. Matt learns that Lauren has filed for divorce. Dylan nearly dies in a Jet Ski accident.

programme.title: The Leprechaun
programme.desc: Beverly Hills, 90210, S09E19, Noah faces foreclosure after failing to make his mortgage payments on the Peach Pit/After Dark building. Steve has a man dress up as a leprechaun and promises a "pot of gold" to the person who catches him.

programme.title: Fortune Cookie
programme.desc: Beverly Hills, 90210, S09E20, Dylan's friendly gift to Kelly upsets Gina; Steve is unnerved by a psychic's bitter prediction; David and Claudia lay the groundwork for their faux marriage; a high-school nemesis asks for Donna's help; Matt prepares to advertise on TV.

programme.title: Local Hero
programme.desc: Beverly Hills, 90210, S09E22, Kelly and Dylan subdue a man who tries to attack a pregnant woman and her child. Gina receives an offer to become a skating commentator. Noah reveals that he has a half-sister, who is working at a nearby diner.

programme.title: End of the World As We Know It
programme.desc: Beverly Hills, 90210, S09E23, Noah's father's company is sued by Matt; Katie moves forward with David; a nannycam catches Matt and Kelly making love; Steve goes Y2Krazy, ignoring - or avoiding - a trip with Janet; a model makes a play for Donna.

programme.title: Agony
programme.desc: Beverly Hills, 90210, S09E25, Kelly receives medical treatment and files a police report. Matt helps a thief gain his release through a technicality. Although Dylan warns that she is still fragile, David asks Gina on a date.

programme.title: The Phantom Menace
programme.desc: Beverly Hills, 90210, S10E01, Kelly is arrested and held overnight until the shooting is ruled a justifiable homicide. David asks Dylan to move out. Wayne annoys Donna with his cavalier attitude, particularly when he fails to show sensitivity toward Kelly.

programme.title: A Fine Mess
programme.desc: Beverly Hills, 90210, S10E04, Steve buys an engagement ring and practices proposals, often with Noah assuming the role of Janet. Dylan grows tired of living with Gina and suggests that she find her own place. David's radio show becomes popular due to his abrasive tactics.

programme.title: The Loo-Ouch
programme.desc: Beverly Hills, 90210, S10E05, Steve and Janet announce the pregnancy and engagement to her parents, who respond by calling Janet a disgrace. Matt and Noah each offer to move out so that Steve can move Janet and the baby into the house.

Candy Cane Candidate, 20251105065600 +0000, Julia returns to her hometown after a stunning defeat in her campaign for city council. While trying to drown her sorrows, she finds herself facing off with an old rival when the town holds an emergency election.

Christmas by Chance, 20251105085700 +0000, A wealthy and popular entrepreneur hires Chance Hazelton, owner of a struggling shop called Gifts by Chance, to help him organize a perfect proposal for his girlfriend.

Inn Love by Christmas, 20251105110400 +0000, A successful young woman living in Miami is climbing her way up the corporate ladder in the hotel industry. Although she doesn't get back to her small northern hometown often, her grandmother is able to convince her to come home for Christmas.
Dear Santa, 20251105130000 +0000, Crystal, a rich party girl, finds a little girl's letter to Santa asking for a new mother, and she vows to win over the father and daughter before the holidays.

Candy Cane Candidate, 20251105225600 +0000, Julia returns to her hometown after a stunning defeat in her campaign for city council. While trying to drown her sorrows, she finds herself facing off with an old rival when the town holds an emergency election.

A Cinderella Christmas, 20161101000000 +0000, The Christmasquerade Ball gives hardworking Angie a chance to let loose. She quickly charms Nicholas but has to go suddenly, leaving him only one clue to find her in this modern, holiday take on the classic fairytale.
A Christmas Princess, 20191201000000 +0000, A prince from Europe comes to New York for a royal holiday dinner and falls in love with the chef that is planning the event.

Must Love Christmas, 20221202000000 +0000, A romance novelist famous for her Christmas-themed books finds herself snowbound in the town of Cranberry Falls, where she unexpectedly becomes involved in a love triangle between her childhood crush and a reporter determined to interview her.

The Spirit of Christmas Station, 20251101000000 +0000, With a Christmas deadline looming, literary editor Isabell retreats to her family's cabin for inspiration. Finding the town in a slump, a local rancher helps her revive the Christmas Festival and discover the ending to her own story.
Wishin' And Hopin', 20141123000000 +0000, The ups and downs of life at a parochial school for 10-year-old Felix as the Christmas nativity pageant approaches.
